name: echidnaboy
text:
Click Robot appears to be an Apple product.

"If your Click Robot is still unresponsive, locate the emergency eject hole and carefully insert a straightened paperclip (paperclip supplied separately)."

name: the_stoned_one
text:
hmmm click robot and ray have something in common
they both have had masters who make them go doodie when they get poked with something pointy

text: I've hit 'reset' on many a digital pet in my time.  It's like robot euthanasia.
